quote: Smile to lighten up.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Smile to be a flower of joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You don’t have to be happy to smile.
author: Daniel Willey

quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: When you smile, you fill the world with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile.
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: It's all about the smiles!
author: Emmy Swain

quote: Be generous with your smile and try not to frown.And you will see my children; your smile will never let you down ☺
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If you're reading this...Congratulations, you're alive.If that's not something to smile about,then I don't know what is.
author: Chad Sugg,  Monsters Under Your Head

quote: Oh no. Don't smile. You'll kill me. I stop breathing when you smile.
author: Tessa Dare,  A Lady of Persuasion

quote: Raise a smile and lower stress
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Well, that's an evil smile...
author: James Patterson,  The Angel Experiment

quote: my mother, poor fish,wanting to be happy, beaten two or three times aweek, telling me to be happy: "Henry, smile!why don't you ever smile?"and then she would smile, to show me how, and it was thesaddest smile I ever saw
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The smile is the most beautiful ornament that you can wear.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I've got nothing to do today but smile.
author: Paul Simon

quote: A smile is a blue sky where the mind can fly.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A sign of gratitude is a thankful smile.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: twice I have lived forever in a smile
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all...
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John

quote: I'm going to smile, and my smile will sink down into your pupils, and heaven knows what it will become.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  No Exit

quote: Peace begins with a smile..
author: Mother Teresa

quote: When you smile, you bloom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sweetest smile is made saddest tear-drop!
author: Edwin Arnold

quote: Your smile shines like the morning sun.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.
author: Jeanne Calment

quote: No matter where life takes me, you'll find me with a smile. Presumed to be happy, always laughing like a child. I never thought life could be this sweet! It's got me cheesing from cheek to cheek!
author: Mac Miller

quote: There's gon' be some stuff you gon' seethat's gon' make it hard to smile in the future.But through whatever you see,through all the rain and the pain,you gotta keep your sense of humor.You gotta be able to smile through all this bullshit.Remember that.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Never trust people who smile constantly. They're either selling something or not very bright.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Burnt Offerings

quote: i hope thatwhoever you arewherever you areand no matter howyou are feelingyou will always have somethingto smile about.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Anyone can smile on their best day. I like to meet a man who can smile on his WORST.
author: Lauren Graham,  Someday, Someday, Maybe

quote: Smile! Accept hatred with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love and compassion are the mother and father of a smile. We need to create more smiles in our world today. Smiles, after all, pave the way to a happy world.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: But you're so busy changing the worldJust one smile can change all of mine
author: Jack Johnson

quote: Smile at strangers and you just might change a life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: if you feel happy, Smile with all your heart. if you're down, smile with all your might.
author: Paul Ian Guillermo

quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Whatever you see you gotta keep a sense of humor; you gotta be able to smile through all the bullshit.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: The most attractive force is a smile.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I haven't mastered the art of sitting and smiling.
author: Ashley Wagner

quote: Never try to do anything that is outside of who you are. A forced smile is a sign of what feels wrong in your heart, so recognize it when it happens. Living a lie will reduce you to one.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: It only takes a split second to smile and forget, yet to someone that needed it, it can last a lifetime.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Here at last is her smile: burn it into your memory; you won't see it often.
author: Junot Díaz,  The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao

quote: I can’t really act the way I want to act, or say what I want to say all the time. And a lot of times, I cover that up with a smile.
author: Hilary Duff
